name: Thule Internal Gear Hub Hitch Adapter (Shimano) - Children
description: Attach your Thule® trailer to a bicycle with a Shimano internal hub.Works with Shimano Nexus 3, 7 and 8-speed and Alfine 8 and 11-speed internal gear hubs.Requires a Torque wrench (0 to 50 Nm) with 13 mm and 19 mm adaptors for installation.
